Q_DESC:
Reena developed an entry control systemfor her  in which each user should enter their numerical id value .each digit in that id is compared with a value value stored in a database if it is matched it will display CAN BE ALLOWEDif there is no matchNOT ALLOWED

Constrint:
Input:
First line:positive integer upto 12000
Second line :Single Digit
Output:
CAN BE ALLOWED if matched
NOT ALLOWED if no match
